{
    "name": "project-template",

    "scripts": {

        "build": "ng build",
        "test": "ng test",

}
src/app/cashmere.module.ts:
import {NgModule} from '@angular/core';
import {
    AddressModule,
    AccordionModule,
    ActionBarModule,
    AppSwitcherModule,
    BannerModule,
    BreadcrumbsModule,
    BusyIndicatorModule,
    ButtonModule,
    CheckboxModule,
    ChipModule,
    DatepickerModule,
    DateRangeModule,
    DialogModule,
    DrawerModule,
    EnvironmentRibbonModule,
    FileInputModule,
    FormFieldModule,
    HeaderModule,
    IconModule,
    InputModule,
    ListModule,
    ModalModule,
    MultiSelectPickerModule,
    NavbarModule,
    PaginationModule,
    PicklistModule,
    PipesModule,
    PopModule,
    ProgressBarModule,
    ProgressIndicatorsModule,
    RadioButtonModule,
    ScrollNavModule,
    RequirementModule,
    SelectModule,
    SliderModule,
    SidenavModule,
    SortModule,
    SubnavModule,
    TableModule,
    TabsModule,
    TileModule,
    ToasterModule,
    ToggleSwitchModule,
    TypeaheadModule,
    TypeaheadTitleModule,
    TypeformSurveyModule,
    WcfTabsModule,
    XanthosFileUploadModule
} from '@wcf-insurance/cashmere';

@NgModule({
    exports: [
        AddressModule,
        AccordionModule,
        ActionBarModule,
        AppSwitcherModule,
        BreadcrumbsModule,
        BannerModule,
        ButtonModule,
        BusyIndicatorModule,
        CheckboxModule,
        ChipModule,
        DatepickerModule,
        DateRangeModule,
        DialogModule,
        DrawerModule,
        EnvironmentRibbonModule,
        FileInputModule,
        FormFieldModule,
        HeaderModule,
        IconModule,
        InputModule,
        ListModule,
        ModalModule,
        MultiSelectPickerModule,
        NavbarModule,
        PaginationModule,
        PicklistModule,
        PipesModule,
        PopModule,
        ProgressBarModule,
        ProgressIndicatorsModule,
        RadioButtonModule,
        RequirementModule,
        ScrollNavModule,
        SelectModule,
        SliderModule,
        SidenavModule,
        SortModule,
        SubnavModule,
        TableModule,
        TabsModule,
        TileModule,
        ToasterModule,
        ToggleSwitchModule,
        TypeaheadModule,
        TypeaheadTitleModule,
        TypeformSurveyModule,
        WcfTabsModule,
        XanthosFileUploadModule
    ]
})
export class CashmereModule {}
